content: I only recently stumbled upon this great reconstruction of the story of the Yoneda lemma, and the author narrows down the date of the conception (or rather, the popularization) of Yoneda's lemma to 'mid-August 1954'... which means we just about missed the 70Â° anniversary of Yoneda lemma!

So, the famous Yoneda lemma was born in Gare du Nord.

I think this is misleading: Mac Lane learnt about the Yoneda lemma at this time, but Yoneda had surely known it for much longer.
True! But since he popularized so much, it's definitely a signficant date. Perhaps saying it's the date it was 'baptized' is more accurate :)
